description:
There are many ways you could describe the enigmatic Lain Oi, but prominent among them would have to be "insatiable fuck machine". You will not believe this girl -- she cums again and again, but just keeps coming back for more. And she likes it fast and pounding deep -- just the way we like it on Fuckingmachines! I hope you have as much fun watching this as we did shooting it.
Yours, G-Force
title: Lain Oi
